plot: Nohelia draws the life of a school director in a village in the colombian rainforest. School is the antithesis to political lawlessness. In every day life ruled by poverty and political despotism, Nohelia teaches her students in Afrocolombianism. Nohelia: &"In order to know where we are going, we have to know where we come from. What do you want to become when you are grown up?&" Children: &"Football player, soldier or drug baron&"   Written by  Hannes Kreuzer
title: Nohelia
